question.text:
How does the content of paragraph 2 relate to the story in paragraph 1?
A Paragraph 2 describes specific elements of the writer's artistic tendencies in more detail.
B Paragraph 2 explains the importance of having a lively imagination for both children and adults.
C Paragraph 2 illustrates how technological progress has changed the world in just a few years.
D Paragraph 2 shows how the writer's childhood fantasies have in a way become reality.
